# Levox CLI

**AI-powered PII/GDPR detection CLI tool**

## 🚀 Quick Install

```bash
pip install levox-cli
```

## 📖 Usage

```bash
# Scan your code for PII/GDPR violations
levox scan

# Show system status
levox status

# Get help
levox --help
```

- **Currently FREE** - No cost to use
- **Paid plans coming soon** - Advanced features will require subscription
